info.title: Trade Academy API
info.description:
API documentation for Trade Academy platform.
    
    This API provides endpoints for managing:
    * Courses and their content
    * Articles
    * Videos
    * Podcasts

get.description: Returns a list of all published articles.
Get detailed information about a specific article.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this مقاله.

get.description: Returns a list of all bookmarks for the current user.

post.description: Bookmark an article. Must be authenticated.

delete.description: Remove a bookmark from an article. Only the owner can remove.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this دسته‌بندی.

get.description: Returns a list of comments for a specific article.

post.description: Create a new comment for an article. Must be authenticated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this نظر.

put.description: Update a comment. Only the owner can update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this نظر.

delete.description: Delete a comment. Only the owner can delete.

parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this نظر.

get.description: Returns a list of all likes for the current user.

post.description: Like an article. Must be authenticated.

delete.description: Remove a like from an article. Only the owner can remove.

get.description: Returns a list of all published podcasts.
Get detailed information about a specific podcast.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this پادکست.

get.description: Returns a list of all published videos.
Get detailed information about a specific video.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this ویدیو.

* `intermediate` - متوسط

token if the refresh token is valid.
